DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine efficacy of SB injection in Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of SB Injection in Patients With Advanced or Primary Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)
DOC.detailed_description: All eligible patients will receive SB injection therapy for 6 cycles (14~21 days for each cycle). Efficacy wll be evaluated every 3 cycles.
